text: Stefan Thesker (born 11 April 1991) is a German professional footballer who plays as a centre back for the Austrian club, SKN St. PÃ¶lten. In June 2018, Thesker joined 2. Bundesliga side Holstein Kiel on a three-year contract until 2021. In February 2016, Thesker announced that he diagnosed with testicular cancer. A year later, he was cancer-free. On 14 March 2020, Thesker tested positive for COVID-19. ==References== Category:1991 births Category:Living people Category:German footballers
